ygData.subject: Cheating Scum!
ygData.msgSnippet: craigbal and you other newbies... I dont know what levels you are but you cant be too high... people who are around level 25 or over know cheating is the
ygData.messageBody:
craigbal and you other newbies... I dont know
what levels you are but you cant be too high... people
who are around level 25 or over know cheating is the
lamest, most wussy thing you could ever do on an ONLINE
GAME. I do not like starting fights in someone elses
forums but COME ON its an online game and your trying to
cheat... Wouldn't be too surprised if you are someone who
cant stand going through life on EQ wearing a suit of
Leather and Banded armor using your rusty sword. People
must really suck if they need to cheat. Heck, I have
trudged through 54 levels, and without cheating I am a
level 54 Cavalier (Cavalier = Paladin who has passed
level 50) and I have never gone as low to try and
CHEAT/HACK the game to get 'phat l3wtz'. Cheating is for the
pure newbie. Plus if Verant catches you exploiting
bugs or hacking account gets automatically banned.
Cheating is a huge thing to them. Be like the rest of us,
to be proud to fight for your earnings and not just
walk through the whole game by exploiting bugs and
getting 'phat l3wtz'. Its not like I NEVER complain about
camping rare spawns for my Deepwater armor and stuff like
that but cheating is going just too low. <br><br>Just
my two copper...<br><br>Sereth (Seffar)
